title: Does the Leaver Buster reset?
body: I know the leaver buster ramps up from like 5mins to 20mins or what not. But does it reset?

replies.body: [Here's](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2622785) an old post from the NA forums. It's quite likely they are using the same system with Leaver Buster.
